DOC.brief_title: 14473 - D9126C00001 Proof Principle Study - Effect AZD2066 Transient Lower Esophageal Sphincter Relaxations
DOC.criteria: Provision write consent prior study specific procedure . Healthy subject , age 1845 year inclusive . Females must childbearing potential must use highly effective contraceptive method . Clinically normal physical finding laboratory value time preentry visit , judge investigator . Clinically significant illness within 2 week prior first dose investigational product , include suspected/manifested infection accord WHO risk category 2 , 3 4 , judge investigator . A measured LES pressure < 5mm Hg . History previous ongoing psychiatric disease/condition .
